workExperience.brief: Worked alongside a Security Engineer, collected data for a lab environment for large school district
workExperience.description:
• Assisted tasks like data ingestion using Cortex XDR to collect logs into the SIEM platform, with ingest rates of 1000 - 2000 EPS (events per second)
  • Coordinated communication with clients, schedule appointments, and managed business relations
  • Managed documents, contracts, as well as server access and audit records
  • Implemented Cortex XDR agent functions, configurations, and deployments
  • Identified, analyzed and resolved cyber threats, using methods such as device log ingestion
  • Built out and deployed Linux applications on VMWare
  • Deployed Cribl using Docker Containers
    • - Used Cribl to enrich and parse incoming data

• AI Tool designed for educators to design quizzes for children in an easily digestible manner using gamified learning. Uses content similar to that seen on social media to better connect with younger children.

• Developed multi-tasking and time management skills under a high-pressure environment
  • Developed resource management skills such as taking stock as well as the ability to preemptively managing tasks in preparation for a heavier workload
  • Thorough understanding of customer communication skills, as well as strong communication skills with peers and co-workers.
